metadata.synopsis: The dock observer has seen that the Vat he was in charge of was destroyed. He articulates this disappointment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to the docks -90; 5; -187Destroy the Vat without trigger crime (can debug kill the vat)Triggers after he sees the destroyed Vat (an invisible helper that moves to the location the vat is destroyed)

0.speaker: Zealot Arden
0.context: NodeContext: Ill-MAY-ter - a god of martyrdom. The curse is a bit like 'Jesus Christ', with a creative 'arsing' thrown in.
